reviewText: Very hard to come by straight to TV movie a cute detective story where Roch Voisine is showcasing his music and acting abilities. The story is not too shabby either,where beautiful girls,dark dungeons,and inept villains all come together. Its about treasure!! And Armin and Bullik unravel all the secrets amid danger .....and its beautiful scenery. Who can resist all the wisecracks !!Very fun to watch.
